title: Chapter Zero
subtitle: The Tutorial
question: Each step of this scavenger hunt starts with a trivia question that is intended for just one of you. But this first question is open to all: What is the house number of the Bullen residence? (If you don't know, it's above the garage door.)
riddleLines: There are two people _______ in Hawkins
One at the center and the other in the north
Head the direction that a _______ points
